org.perfidix

Class AbstractConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.perfidix.AbstractConfig
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractConfig.StandardConfig, Config

    public abstract class AbstractConfig
extends Object
    Configuration for Benchmark. Simple pass this class through the Perfidix-Class. Each setting is hold over here. This class must be inherited by a constructor which has no arguments to provide easy instantiation. This can be done in the following way: 

     
 @BenchmarkConfig
 public class Config extends AbstractConfig {
     private final static int RUNS = 100;
     private final static AbstractMeter[] METERS = {
         new TimeMeter(Time.MilliSeconds), new MemMeter(Memory.Byte)
     };
     private final static AbstractOutput[] OUTPUT = {
         new TabularSummaryOutput()
     };
     private final static KindOfArrangement ARRAN = KindOfArrangement.SequentialMethodArrangement;
     private final static double GCPROB = 1.0d;
 
     public Config() {
         super(RUNS, METERS, OUTPUT, ARRAN, GCPROB);
     }
 }

    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz
